products.name: Actiontec ScreenBeam Wireless Display Receiver (SBWD100ACA)
products.shortDescription: What better way to garner oohs and aahs for your fabulous vacation photos or inspiring video than projecting it on a big screen. Get everyone in on the fun with the ScreenBeam Pro wireless display receiver from Actiontec. Share videos, photos and movies from your device to an HDTV, even mirror your smartphone or laptop screen.

products.name: LaunchPort AM.2 iPad Mini Sleeve (70305) - White
products.shortDescription: Part of the LaunchPort system, the LaunchPort AP.2 Sleeve protects your iPad mini, while allowing you to charge it on a WallStation or BaseStation (sold separately). It's equipped with magnets for secure mounting to a station, and even allows you to mount your iPad to a metallic surface such as a refrigerator.

products.name: Klipsch Speakers (IC650TW)
products.shortDescription: The Klipsch IC-650-T speakers create memorable sound experiences. They're horn-loaded for clear sound no matter where you place it, while a 6.5" woofer and 1" Tractrix port ensure that you get rich, deep bass. With the multi-tap transformer and 4-ohm bypass, you can enjoy clear, distributed audio. The compact design makes it easy to mount even in low-ceiling setups.

products.name: Cisco Wireless N Router (WAP321-A-K9) - White
products.shortDescription: Designed for small businesses, Cisco's WAP321-A-K9 wireless router delivers secure and high-speed 802.11n wireless connectivity to employees, clients and guests anywhere in the office. With features that help you extend the reach of your office network and prioritize traffic flow, enjoy faster, reliable connections for demanding applications.

products.name: Atlas Sound 3-Input Channel Mixer Amplifier (AA60)
products.shortDescription: Manage small business systems with the Atlas Sound AA60, a 3-input channel mixer amplifier that works with a variety of input sources to create a Zone 2 mix for music or messaging on hold applications. Connect with paging microphones, digital music receivers, CD players and more to page employees while your client enjoys hold music.

products.name: LaunchPort AM.2 iPad Mini Sleeve (70304) - Black
products.shortDescription: Part of the LaunchPort system, the LaunchPort AP.2 Sleeve protects your iPad mini, while allowing you to charge it on a WallStation or BaseStation (sold separately). It's equipped with magnets for secure mounting to a station, and even allows you to mount your iPad to a metallic surface such as a refrigerator.

products.name: Klipsch Loudspeaker (CA800TW)
products.shortDescription: The Klipsch CA-800T loudspeaker is perfect for playing exceptional foreground or background sound. Designed for distributed audio applications, it has a 90 degree x 90 degree Tractrix Horn tweeter for distortion-free and crystal clear highs. Made for indoor and outdoor use, it has a paintable UV-resistant ABS enclosure and tough, rustproof aluminum grille.

products.name: Aver AVerVision PL50 Platform Document Camera - English
products.shortDescription: Ideal for any classroom or presentation, the AVerVision PL50 Platform Document Camera features a 5MP sensor and Full HD 1080 output via HDMI. The result is clear, sharp images, while the robust 16x optical zoom and 240x total zoom make sure that every detail stands out.

products.name: Peerless 10" - 23" Desktop Monitor Mount (LCT202)
products.shortDescription: Save table space with the Peerless LCT202 Desktop Mount. It not only raises your monitor off of your desk, but it's also a convenient, space-saving solution for dual monitor setups. It accommodates flat panel displays between 10" to 23" and weighing up to 22kg. Adjust your monitor to the perfect angle with a tilt range of -10° to +10° and swivel range of -20° and +20° .

products.name: LaunchPort WallStation iPad Wallmount (70170) - Black
products.shortDescription: Part of the LaunchPort system, the LaunchPort WallStation allows you to mount and charge your iPad on the wall when in a LaunchPort Sleeve (sold separately). Using magnets to keep your iPad securely mounted, the WallStation is ideal for a variety of applications, including digital signage, gallery showings, and more.

products.name: LaunchPort AP.4 iPad 4th Generation Sleeve (70181) - Black
products.shortDescription: Part of the LaunchPort system, the LaunchPort AP.4 Sleeve protects your iPad, while allowing you to charge it on a WallStation or BaseStation (sold separately). It's equipped with magnets for secure mounting to a station, and even allows you to mount your iPad to a metallic surface such as a refrigerator.

products.name: ust Mobile UpStand Tablet Stand (ST818)
products.shortDescription: The Just Mobile UpStand props up your iPad to a convenient position for watching videos, working with a keyboard, and more. Constructed of aluminum, this stand securely holds your iPad in place thanks to the supporting rubber grips.

products.name: Avermedia TabChargeCT Cart (CRMCHRG01)
products.shortDescription: Charge a slew of devices from a single hub. The Avermedia TabChargeCT is a charging cart for Chromebooks, tablets and Netbooks. Set a default charging duration or a schedule to ensure your group stays powered up during peak hours; the built-in timer effectively groups and charges 12 devices at a time, for a total of 36 devices.

products.name: LaunchPort Control Mount For iPad Mini (70094) - White
products.shortDescription: Show off your iPad mini like a work of art using the LaunchPort Control Mount. Designed for the iPad mini, this unit securely mounts an iPad mini to a wall, making it perfect for digital signage, home automation, and more. It charges your iPad mini as it's mounted, so you won't have to worry about the battery draining.

products.name: Peerless 26" - 46" Full Tilt Flat-Panel TV Wall Mount (SF16D)
products.shortDescription: The Peerless SA746PU Articulating Wall Arm allows you to mount 26"-46" flat panel displays and extend them up to 20.92" from the wall. There are three adjustable pivot points and a one-touch tilt mechanism up to +15/-5 degrees. Everything will look neat and organized with an integrated cable management system that keeps the cables out of the way.

products.name: Klipsch Speakers (IC525TB)
products.shortDescription: The Klipsch IC-525-T speakers help you create memorable experiences for your customers. Enjoy powerful, crystal clear sound with wide dispersion horn technology and a two-way design with a 5.25" woofer and 1" titanium diaphragm compression driver. A round Tractrix Horn with XT technology delivers smooth response, while the 1" Tractrix port offers richer, rumbling bass.

products.name: LaunchPort AP.4 iPad 4th Generation Sleeve (70182) - White
products.shortDescription: Part of the LaunchPort system, the LaunchPort AP.4 Sleeve protects your iPad, while allowing you to charge it on a WallStation or BaseStation (sold separately). It's equipped with magnets for secure mounting to a station, and even allows you to mount your iPad to a metallic surface such as a refrigerator.

products.name: Atlas Sound Coaxial Ceiling Speaker (FAP82T) - White
products.shortDescription: Perfect for commercial, industrial and institutional applications, the Atlas Sound FAP82T coaxial ceiling speaker delivers audio loud and clear. It features an 8" driver, extended low-frequency response and a 60W enhanced quality internal transformer. This loudspeaker fits well with high ceilings and is ideal for music, voice and signal reproduction.

products.name: eBeam Edge Wireless Complete
products.shortDescription: Make learning fun with eBeam Edge Wireless Complete. Ideal in the classroom or boardroom, eBeam Edge uses your existing computer, projector and whiteboard to create an interactive workspace. Project a presentation onto your whiteboard and use the included stylus to write and draw on top of it. Or, use the eBeam Capture Pack to record whiteboard notes and stream them to remote students.

products.name: Atlas Sound 3-Channel 60W Mixer Amplifier (MA60G)
products.shortDescription: The Atlas Sound MA60G three-channel amplifier is designed for distributed business paging and background music (BGM) as well as small-to-medium speech privacy systems. It's small and compact, and built for reliability.

products.name: ZeeVee Digital Encorder/Modulator (HDB2640)
products.shortDescription: Enjoy incredible digital image and audio quality with the ZeeVee HD Bridge 2000 series modulator. There are two digital channels per RF frequency for up to four total channels. Both analog and digital audio are internally encoded and broadcast in Dolby Digital AC-3. It also features a colour LCD front panel for at-a-glance monitoring and status updates.

products.name: Avermedia TabSync Charging Cart
products.shortDescription: This handy device can charge up to 32 Apple or Android tablets at once. Just place your tablet or tablets in the TabSync, hook it up to your Mac, and connect the tablet cable charger to a USB port. The LED status indicator glows red when syncing, amber when charging, and green when fully charged. It even charges while syncing.

products.name: Tripp Lite 24-Outlet Vertical Power Strip (PS7224-15) - White
products.shortDescription: The Tripp Lite power strip offers a versatile power source with 24 standard outlets and vertical or horizontal mounting options. Its rugged, all-metal housing is ideal for commercial uses, such as industrial, retail display and workbench applications.

products.name: Peerless SmartMount 60" Flat Panel TV Carts (WL-SR560M-200)
products.shortDescription: Hitch up your HDTV for display. SmartMount Flat Panel TV Carts mount 32"-60" televisions on mobile, durable stands designed to improve presentation quality for video conferencing, trade shows, and more.

products.name: Intelix Receiver (DIGI-HD60C-R)
products.shortDescription: The Intelix DIGI-HD60C-R receiver extends the range of HDMI, IR and RS232 devices so you can receive full HD video signals over distances up to 60 metres and 4K signals up to 35 metres. With its flexible design, you can power the unit at either the TX or RX end using only one power supply.

products.name: Intelix HDMI/VGA Auto-Switching Wall Plate (ASW-WP)
products.shortDescription: The Intelix ASW-WP  two-gang, Decora-style wall plate is designed to act as the primary PC interface for classrooms, boardrooms and conference centres. It's able to detect and switch the input to active video. With the Display Control software, you can control the TV or projector with RS232 commands, or turn the display on or off automatically.

products.name: LaunchPort AP.5 iPad Air Sleeve (70300) - Black
products.shortDescription: Part of the LaunchPort system, the LaunchPort AP.5 Sleeve protects your iPad Air, while allowing you to charge it on a WallStation or BaseStation (sold separately). This thin and lightweight sleeve is equipped with magnets for secure mounting to a station, and even allows you to mount your iPad Air to a metallic surface such as a refrigerator.

products.name: Atlas 6" Coaxial Speaker System (FAP62T)
products.shortDescription: Atlas Sound's FAP62T 6" coaxial speaker system combines superior performance with easy installation. A low-profile design and wide coverage make it an ideal choice for low ceilings and it is perfect for a variety of commercial, industrial, and institutional applications that require clear, high fidelity sound.

products.name: Peerless 23" Desktop Monitor Mount (LCT203)
products.shortDescription: The Peerless LCT203 Desktop Mount helps you organize and maximize your desk space. It not only raises your monitor off of your desk, but it's also a convenient, space-saving solution for dual monitor setups. It accommodates flat panel displays up to 23" and weighing up to 20kg. Adjust your monitor to the perfect angle with a tilt range of -10° to +10° and swivel range of -20° to +20°.

products.name: Audix Wireless Microphone System (W3HT5BGB)
products.shortDescription: The Audix Wireless Microphone System (W3-HT5BGB) is designed for a wide range of different applications, from live performances and presentations to fixed installations and houses of worship. It has 193 selectable frequencies to help avoid interference as well as a dual tuner and true diversity receivers.

products.name: Ashly 2-Channel 1600W 2Ohm Amplifier (KLR3200)
products.shortDescription: Plug in to superior sound quality with an Ashly KLR3200-Series amplifier. This lightweight two-channel 2x1600W power amp is heavy on efficiency, suited for a wide range of sound reinforcement with 3-position gain, mode, and HPF switches and optimized to deliver professional sonic perfection with every pitch in professional audio or fixed performance installation applications.

products.name: Atlas Sound Audio Power Amplifier (CP400)
products.shortDescription: This Atlas Sound CP400 audio power amplifier gives you amazing reliability and performance for demanding contractor applications. It features two independent channels to ensure maximum channel separation and low distortion figures. It also provides an extended frequency response that's ideal for large, distributed constant voltage sound systems and high SPL sound reinforcement systems.
